title: 12 year old child MURDERED yet no action was taken against so called "bullies"
selftext:
This is not bullying, this is murder. My heart was broken hearing his painful cries. This is unbelievable and my blood is boiling that he did not get any justice.

Kintan Saraswat
cleaned_text: year old child murdered yet action taken called bullies bullying murder heart broken hearing painful cries unbelievable blood boiling get justice kintan saraswat
